title: Project Management: A Managerial Approach 8th c2012 Meredith
description:
Project Management: A Managerial Approach, 8th Edition (c2012), textbook by Jack R. Meredith & Samuel J. Mantel, Jr.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002031
(ISBN-13: 9780470533024)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
 1. Projects in Contemporary Organizations
PART I - PROJECT INITIATION
 2. Strategic Management and Project Selection
 3. The Project Manager
 4. Managing Conflict and the Art of Negotiation
 5. The Project in the Organizational Structure
PART II - PROJECT PLANNING
 6. Project Activity and Risk Planning
 7. Budgeting : Estimating Costs and Risks
 8. Scheduling
 9. Resource Allocation
PART III - PROJECT EXECUTION
 10. Monitoring and Information Systems
 11. Project Control
 12. Project Auditing
 13. Project Termination
